snippet.title: 8 Ball Pool: Gameplay trailer - a free Miniclip game
snippet.description:
8 Ball Pool is the world's biggest pool game for web, Facebook, iOS (iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch) and Android. ►SUBSCRIBE for more: http://mcgam.es/miniclipsubscribe

8 Ball Pool is the biggest multiplayer pool game on the planet! Play for free against other players and friends in 1-on-1 matches, and enter multiplayer tournaments for the billiards crown. Miniclip's 8 Ball Pool is also available to play on web, iOS (iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch) and Android devices.

►PLAY NOW on web: https://mcgam.es/playpool
►DOWNLOAD mobile version: https://mcgam.es/download-8BP

Keep up to date with the latest 8 Ball Pool news from the Miniclip team!
►Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/8ballpool/
►Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/8ballpoolfans/
►Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/8ballpool

ABOUT MINICLIP 
Miniclip is home to over 1000 great free games online and on iPhone, iPad, Android and Windows Phone. Our YouTube channel brings you the best trailers, walkthroughs, tips and tricks, gameplay footage and fan-made videos from all things Miniclip, with new videos added every week. 

We publish the best videos on our hit games, including 8 Ball Pool, Ultimate Golf, Mini Football, Carrom and plenty more. Subscribe to our channel http://mcgam.es/miniclipsubscribe or play games on Miniclip now: http://mcgam.es/PlayMiniclip 

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Miniclip
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Miniclip
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/miniclip
LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/company/miniclip
FAQ and Support: https://mcgam.es/support
